text: “Soni nkasimunkulupilila jwalijose ikaweje jwaakuyiye dini jenu (ja Chiyuda kapena Chikilisito).” Jilani: “Chisimu naga chongoko chisyesyene ni chongoko cha Allah basi.” (Ayuda ni Akilisitowo akasatiji sikati jao: “Nkasinkulupilila) ataakwika mwapedwile jwalijose yakulandana ni yampedwile wanganyammwe, kapena kuti ataakwika mwan'gomeche kwa M'mbuje gwenu.” Jilani: “Chisimu umbone wosope uli m’Myala mwa Allah akasampaga jwansachile, sano Allah ni Jwakwanila kusyene (ku iwumbe Yakwe), Jwakumanyilila nnope.”
